WELCOME_MESSAGE_TITLE.description: Title of message to be displayed in unconfigured extension.

WELCOME_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION.message: Add your StoredSafe host and API key below or ask your administrator to configure the extension for you.
WELCOME_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION.description: Description part of message to be displayed in unconfigured extension.

WELCOME_MESSAGE_PLUG.message: If you are not yet a StoredSafe customer, please visit storedsafe.com for more information.
WELCOME_MESSAGE_PLUG.description: StoredSafe plug part of message to be displayed in unconfigured extension.

MENU_ADD.description: Text for menu item to open the add page.

MENU_SESSIONS.description: Text for menu item to open the sessions page.

MENU_GENERATE_PASSWORD.description: Text for menu item to open the generate password page.

MENU_OPTIONS.description: Text for menu item to open the options page.

SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER.description: Placeholder text to be displayed in an empty search bar.

SEARCH_EMPTY.message: Found no match for your search in StoredSafe.
SEARCH_EMPTY.description: Text to be displayed when a search returns no results.

SEARCH_ARIA_LABEL_NEEDLE.description: Aria label for the search bar because it has no actual label.

SEARCH_ARIA_LABEL_SUBMIT.description: Aria label for the search submit button because it has no actual text.

SEARCH_RESULT_CANCEL_EDIT.description: Text for cancel button when editing a search result.

SEARCH_RESULT_SAVE.description: Text for button to save changes when editing a search result.

SEARCH_RESULT_FILL.description: Text for button to fill a search result on the current webpage.

SEARCH_RESULT_EDIT.description: Text for button to open edit mode for a search result.

SEARCH_RESULT_DELETE.description: Text for button to delete a search result.

SEARCH_RESULT_CONFIRM_DELETE.message: Are you sure you want to delete this object?
SEARCH_RESULT_CONFIRM_DELETE.description: Text in confirmation dialog after clicking the delete button on a search object.

SEARCH_ERROR.message: Was unable to fetch results from StoredSafe.
SEARCH_ERROR.description: Error text to be displayed when a search fails.

ADD_HOST.description: Label for StoredSafe host select box when creating a new object.

ADD_VAULT.description: Label for StoredSafe vault select box when creating a new object.

ADD_TEMPLATE.description: Label for StoredSafe template select box when creating a new object.

ADD_CREATE.description: Text for button to create a new object.

ADD_SUCCESS.description: Message to be displayed after successfully adding object to StoredSafe.

SESSIONS_LOGIN_TYPE.description: Label for login type select box on login page.

SESSIONS_LOGIN_TYPE_TOTP.description: TOTP option text in login type select box on login page.

SESSIONS_LOGIN_TYPE_YUBIKEY.description: YubiKey option text in login type select box on login page.

SESSIONS_USERNAME.description: Label for username input on login page.

SESSIONS_PASSPHRASE.description: Label for passphrase input on login page.

SESSIONS_OTP.description: Label for OTP input on login page.

SESSIONS_KEYS.description: Label for keys input (passphrase + yubikey press OTP) on login page.

SESSIONS_LOGIN.description: Text for button to login on login page.

SESSIONS_LOGOUT.description: Text for button to logout on site info page.

SESSIONS_REMEMBER.description: Label for remember username checkbox on login page.

SESSIONS_ONLINE.description: Text to indicate online status on sessions page.

SESSIONS_OFFLINE.description: Text to indicate offline status on sessions page.

SESSIONS_VIOLATIONS_ICON_TITLE.description: Hover text for StoredSafe violations icon on sessions page.

SESSIONS_WARNINGS_ICON_TITLE.description: Hover text for StoredSafe warnings icon on sessions page.

SESSIONS_STATUS.description: Header text for session status on site info page.

SESSIONS_WARNINGS.description: Header text for warnings on site info page.

SESSIONS_VIOLATIONS.description: Header text for errors on site info page.

SESSIONS_ONLINE_SINCE.description: Text describing since when and how many minutes the user has been online.

SESSIONS_GOTO.description: Text for button to go to StoredSafe host.

MESSAGES_MORE.description: Text to be displayed when messages overflow, indicating the total number of messages.

MESSAGES_ONE_MORE.description: Text to be displayed when messages overflow by a single message.

MESSAGES_CLEAR.description: Text to be displayed on button to close all messages.

IMG_LOGO_ALT.description: Alt text for StoredSafe logo image.

PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH_ERROR.message: Must be at least $NUMBER$ characters long.
PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH_ERROR.description: Error to be displayed when the password is too short.

PASSWORD_MAX_LENGTH_ERROR.message: Must be no more than $NUMBER$ characters long.
PASSWORD_MAX_LENGTH_ERROR.description: Error to be displayed when the password is too long.

PASSWORD_MIN_LOWERCASE_CHARS_ERROR.message: Must contain at least $NUMBER$ lowercase characters.
PASSWORD_MIN_LOWERCASE_CHARS_ERROR.description: Error to be displayed when the password contains too few lowercase characters.

PASSWORD_MAX_LOWERCASE_CHARS_ERROR.message: Must contain no more than $NUMBER$ lowercase characters.
PASSWORD_MAX_LOWERCASE_CHARS_ERROR.description: Error to be displayed when the password contains too many lowercase characters.

PASSWORD_MIN_UPPERCASE_CHARS_ERROR.message: Must contain at least $NUMBER$ uppercase characters
PASSWORD_MIN_UPPERCASE_CHARS_ERROR.description: Error to be displayed when the password contains too few uppercase characters.

PASSWORD_MAX_UPPERCASE_CHARS_ERROR.message: Must contain no more than $NUMBER$ uppercase characters.
PASSWORD_MAX_UPPERCASE_CHARS_ERROR.description: Error to be displayed when the password contains too many uppercase characters.

PASSWORD_DISALLOW_NUMERIC_CHARS_ERROR.description: Error to be displayed when the password contains numbers (if not allowed).

PASSWORD_DISALLOW_NUMERIC_FIRST_ERROR.message: May not start with a number.
PASSWORD_DISALLOW_NUMERIC_FIRST_ERROR.description: Error to be displayed when the password starts with a number (if not allowed).

PASSWORD_DISALLOW_NUMERIC_LAST_ERROR.message: May not end with a number.
PASSWORD_DISALLOW_NUMERIC_LAST_ERROR.description: Error to be displayed when the password ends with a number (if not allowed).

PASSWORD_MIN_NUMERIC_CHARS_ERROR.message: Must contain at least $NUMBER$ numeric characters.
PASSWORD_MIN_NUMERIC_CHARS_ERROR.description: Error to be displayed when the password contains too few numeric characters.

PASSWORD_MAX_NUMERIC_CHARS_ERROR.message: Must contain no more than $NUMBER$ numeric characters.
PASSWORD_MAX_NUMERIC_CHARS_ERROR.description: Error to be displayed when the password contains too many numeric characters.

PASSWORD_DISALLOW_NONALPHANUMERIC_CHARS_.description: Error to be displayed when the password contains non-alphanumeric characters (if not allowed).

PASSWORD_DISALLOW_NONALPHANUMERIC_FIRST_.message: May not start with a non-alphanumeric character.
PASSWORD_DISALLOW_NONALPHANUMERIC_FIRST_.description: Error to be displayed when the password starts with a non-alphanumeric character (if not allowed).

PASSWORD_DISALLOW_NONALPHANUMERIC_LAST_E.message: May not end with a non-alphanumeric character.
PASSWORD_DISALLOW_NONALPHANUMERIC_LAST_E.description: Error to be displayed when the password ends with a non-alphanumeric character (if not allowed).

PASSWORD_MIN_NONALPHANUMERIC_CHARS_ERROR.message: Must contain at least $NUMBER$ non-alphanumeric characters.
PASSWORD_MIN_NONALPHANUMERIC_CHARS_ERROR.description: Error to be displayed when the password contains too few non-alphanumeric characters.

PASSWORD_MAX_NONALPHANUMERIC_CHARS_ERROR.message: Must contain no more than $NUMBER$ non-alphanumeric characters.
PASSWORD_MAX_NONALPHANUMERIC_CHARS_ERROR.description: Error to be displayed when the password contains too many non-alphanumeric characters.

CONFIRM_DIALOG_YES.description: Text for button to confirm choice in confirm dialog.

CONFIRM_DIALOG_NO.description: Text for button to deny choice in confirm dialog.

RESULT_COPY.description: Text for button to copy value of search result field.

RESULT_LOGIN.description: Text for button to open a search result URL and fill form fields on the opened page.

RESULT_SHOW.description: Text for button to show encrypted field data of search result.

RESULT_HIDE.description: Text for button to hide encrypted field data of search result.

RESULT_LARGE.description: Text for button to show passwords in large text format.

RESULT_SMALL.description: Text for button to revert passwords to small text format.

SETTINGS_AUTO_FILL_LABEL.description: Label for auto fill settings input.

SETTINGS_AUTO_FILL_TITLE.message: Automatically fill forms on webpages you visit.
SETTINGS_AUTO_FILL_TITLE.description: Hover text for auto fill settings input.

SETTINGS_IDLE_MAX_LABEL.description: Label for idle max settings input.

SETTINGS_MAX_TOKEN_LIFE_LABEL.description: Label for max token life settings input.

SETTINGS_UNIT_MINUTES.description: Descriptive unit for number type settings input.

SETTINGS_UNIT_HOURS.description: Descriptive unit for number type settings input.

SETTINGS_USER_HEADER.description: Header for section of general setting where user can edit settings.

SETTINGS_USER_TITLE.message: Settings which can be adjusted by you.
SETTINGS_USER_TITLE.description: Hover text for user settings header.

SETTINGS_USER_UPDATE.description: Text on button to update settings.

SETTINGS_USER_ALL_LOCKED.message: All settings are locked by your administrator.

SETTINGS_MANAGED_HEADER.description: Header for section of general settings managed by organization.

SETTINGS_MANAGED_TITLE.message: Settings which are enforced by your administrator.
SETTINGS_MANAGED_TITLE.description: Hover text for managed settings header.

SETTINGS_MANAGED_TRUE.description: Translation of checkbox boolean checked value.

SETTINGS_MANAGED_FALSE.description: Translation of checkbox boolean unchecked value.

OPTIONS_GENERAL_TITLE.description: Title for options menu item to open general settings.

OPTIONS_GENERAL_SUBTITLE.description: Subtitle for options menu item to open general settings.

OPTIONS_SITES_TITLE.description: Title for options menu item to manage sites.

OPTIONS_SITES_SUBTITLE.description: Subtitle for options menu item to manage sites.

OPTIONS_IGNORE_TITLE.description: Title for options menu item to manage ignore list.

OPTIONS_IGNORE_SUBTITLE.message: Websites that shouldn't be saved by StoredSafe
OPTIONS_IGNORE_SUBTITLE.description: Subtitle for options menu item to manage ignore list.

OPTIONS_DATA_TITLE.description: Title for options menu item to manage extension data.

OPTIONS_DATA_SUBTITLE.description: Subtitle for options menu item to manage extension data.

OPTIONS_SITES_ADD_HEADER.description: Header for add site area of options.

OPTIONS_SITES_USER_HEADER.description: Header for user sites area of options.

OPTIONS_SITES_MANAGED_HEADER.description: Header for managed sites area of options.

OPTIONS_SITES_USER_TITLE.description: Hover text for header to user sites area of options.

OPTIONS_SITES_MANAGED_TITLE.description: Hover text for header to managed sites area of options.

OPTIONS_SITES_ADD.description: Text for button to submit form to add a new site.

OPTIONS_SITES_DELETE.description: Text for button to submit form to remove an existing site.

OPTIONS_SITES_ADD_LABEL_HOST.description: Label text for host input of add site form of options.

OPTIONS_SITES_ADD_LABEL_APIKEY.description: Label text for apikey input of add site form of options.

LOADING_UNKNOWN_ERROR.message: Something went wrong here, please tell us or your administrator what you were doing so we can fix the problem!
LOADING_UNKNOWN_ERROR.description: User-friendly error when some uncaught error occurs further down the chain.

OPTIONS_IGNORE_EMPTY.description: Message to be displayed in ignore list settings when the list is empty.

OPTIONS_IGNORE_DELETE.description: Text for button to delete URL from ignore list.
